name: herusec-scan
description: Add Horusec scan for static code analysis
author: Mike Huang

inputs.name: sarifReportPath
inputs.label: SARIF report path
inputs.helpMarkDown: If not empty, will add `-o sarif` and `-O {path}` to the command. Which will generate a sarif report file in the path.

inputs.name: sarifPathConvert
inputs.label: Convert SARIF Report uri relatived to Azure Repo?
inputs.helpMarkDown: If `sarifReportPath` is not empty, you can check this option to convert the uri path to repository file path in sarif file.

inputs.name: otherOptions
inputs.label: Other options of Horusec CLI command
